option.name: originalContent

option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Larger rounded background (optional, transparent) --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <corners android:radius="32dp" /> <solid android:color="@android:color/transparent" /> </shape> </item> <!-- Aggressively scaled icon (vector/adaptive base) --> <item android:gravity="center"> <scale android:drawable="@drawable/ic_launcher_icon" android:scaleWidth="240%" android:scaleHeight="240%" /> </item> </layer-list>
